General.Name: Norsemont Mining Inc
General.Description: Norsemont Mining Inc., a junior mining company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. It holds a 100% interest in the Choquelimpie gold and silver project covering an area of approximately 5,757 hectares located in northern Chile. The company was formerly known as Norsemont Capital Inc. and changed its name to Norsemont Mining Inc. in February 2020. Norsemont Mining Inc. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 700 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1G8
